name: Chicken House
description: Housing for 25,000-50,000 broilers producing 108.5 tons of litter annually per house

current.description: Traditional poultry operations generate significant waste with disposal costs and environmental liabilities

outputs.label: Poultry litter
outputs.amount: 108.5 tons/year per house → Direct to land

issues: High ammonia emissions affecting bird and worker health
1-3% higher mortality from poor air quality

proposed.description: Biochar-enhanced poultry operations with circular nutrient management and improved air quality
benefits: Reduced foot damage (chicken feet worth as much as whole chicken)
Premium pricing in some markets for biochar-raised poultry

technicalDetails.scale: Average 25,000 SF house producing 976,800 lbs birds/year
technicalDetails.litterComposition: High nitrogen (2-6%), high phosphorus (1-3%), bedding material
